oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Invoice of surgical instruments issued to Dr. Elihu P. Pierce
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This invoice from the U.S. Army Medical Purveyor's Office lists the field case, pocket set and teeth extracting set issued to Asst. Surgeon Dr. Elihu P. Pierce, 6th N. H. Inf., USA. He was also listed as Field & Staff.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
